mapper.select: SELECT rev_no, userid, star, comments, DATE_FORMAT(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as regdate FROM review WHERE mno = #{mno} ORDER BY regdate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (mno, userid, star, comments) VALUES (#{mno}, #{userid}, #{star}, #{comments})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review WHERE rev_no = #{revNo} AND userid = #{userid}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET star = #{star}, comments = #{comments}, regdate = NOW() WHERE rev_no = #{revNo} AND userid = #{userid}
